index.comment: Hello there! This is my portfolio website.

text.1: I am 14 years old and currently studying at a gymnasium in Germany. I'm currently learning JavaScript, React, Java, HTML, CSS and Python. I like Ubuntu servers and working with them everyday. Also I like to play video games like Minecraft and sometimes Call of Duty.
text.2: Currently I'm working at some projects in my GitHub organisation | like | or
text.3: I'm also very interested in DevOps, Docker and Kubernetes and I'm currently learning how to use them.

index.footer: Thak you so much for visiting this page. ü§ç

remy.name: Remy
remy.description: He has made the style and the layout of this website. He also gave me the Idea of this website.
